syslog-ng-ose-guide-admin.title: The syslog-ng Open Source Edition 3.12 Administrator Guide
syslog-ng-ose-guide-admin.description: This manual is the primary documentation of the syslog-ng Open Source Edition application

syslog-ng-tutorial-mutual-auth-tls.title: Mutual authentication using TLS in syslog-ng OSE
syslog-ng-tutorial-mutual-auth-tls.description: This tutorial shows you step-by-step how to create the certificates required to authenticate your server and your clients, and how to configure syslog-ng Open Source Edition (syslog-ng OSE) to send your log messages in an encrypted connection
